DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study estimate effect multiple oral dos PF-03882845 pharmacokinetics simvastatin simvastatin acid healthy , adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study Of Effect Of PF-03882845 On Simvastatin Pharmacokinetics
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female nonchildbearing potential age 18 ( 21 base countryspecific age consent ) 60 year , inclusive , Screening . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical/safety laboratory test . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 inclusive ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Use CYP3A4 inhibitor ( eg , ketoconazole , ciprofloxacin , diltiazem ) inducer ( eg , pheytoin , carbamazepine ) substrate ( eg , simvastatin , quinidine ) within 28 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior Day 1 . Known history hypersensitivity , allergy , severe adverse drug reaction intolerance simvastatin statin .
